value.title: Create Dynamic Query Parameters in Power BI Desktop  - Power BI Tips & Tricks #47

value.title: DAX Fridays! #10: RANK/ TOPN with slicer
value.excerpt: In this video you will learn how to create a custom slicer that will rank your data based on the criteria that you specify, for example, Top 3, Top 5 and Top 10. value.title: DAX Fridays! #4: COUNT, COUNTA, COUNTX, COUNTAX, DISTINCTCOUNT AND COUNTROWS in DAX

Here you have the keynotes for the video so you can jump to the function you want to learn:  02:44 COUNT text (#ERROR) 03:24 COUNT numbers 04:20 COUNT blanks 04:56 COUNT dates 05:36 COUNTA text 06:44 COUNTA numbers 07:27 COUNTX 09:16 COUNTAX

value.title: DAX Fridays! #9: RANKX DAX Function
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the DAX RANKX() function to arrange your data based on criteria that you specify.
